title: Backpackk
description:
Backpackk is an AI-powered travel platform that handles everything from creating custom itineraries to sorting out your schedule, budget, and what you like to do.
With its built-in booking engine, Backpackk lets you book everything in one spot—hotels, transportation, activities, you name it. It even checks prices across different sites to make sure you're getting the best bang for your buck.
You can also share your trips on your profile and inspire other people's nest journey.
